part.Name: Description
part.Short: Anarchy is wound into stasis by time's virtual antipode and packaged into a metal disc. Only the instruction of movement will direct it to unaccrete.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wood was shaved into a bludgeoning bulb.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An armlength of time-tortured metal is punched through with screwing iron for extra torque.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A bulb of stone is dusted by humoric powders.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Quartersawn witchwood wears a thousand nicks along its warped length.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Brinestalk was scythed from its marsh home and dried in the high salt sun. Its top is spiraled into a crook.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A corm of bell bronze is screw-fitted to a scarred wooden shaft.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Iron lines unfold into a head of six flanges.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hand grease shines on the pole, and a volume of polished steel weights one end.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hand grease shines on the tall pole, and a hefty volume of polished steel weighs one end.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A corm of polished steel is blown out of a combat-pecked rod.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Across Moghra'yi, wood was hewn from the trunk of a boreal titan and shaved into a stick by practitioners of the foreign art. They shaped one end of the bark into an oaken knot.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A fist-sized snail shell is coiled in soft spirals, blackened with soot, and stinks of sulfur.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's the hoary, bowing horn of a wizened mangoat, wind-etched and gilded with scarlet tassels.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's a gnarled, acacia staff set with a small orb of primordial amber.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The shaft widens to a rigid polygon of azure metal. Nicks and scores tally on its surface.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The long shaft widens to a rigid and symmetric polygon of azure metal. Nicks and scores tally on its two heads.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The hammer shaft is capped by a head of bright and azure metal. Darker stripes across its face and throat note where it struck and beat softer carbide down.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The hammer pole is capped by a twin-head of bright and azure metal. Darker stripes across its faces and throats note where it struck and beat softer carbide down.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A dusky mass of gravid metal, like a meteorite, is welded to a steel shaft.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A dusky and twin-faced mass of gravid metal, like a meteorite, is welded to a steel pole.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue. Casts mottled with dust particles were culled and fed to lithovores, leaving only the perfect hexagonal prisms.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue. Casts mottled with dust particles were culled and fed to lithovores, leaving only the perfect hexagonal prisms.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Quark-gluon plasma rapidly cooled and was extinguished on the voidpeaks of the early universe, except where the globules got trapped in 6D kinks of spacetime. There they glided in the slipstream for billions of years until beings discovered them, built machines to extract and cool them, and reheat them in their stellar furnaces.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Quark-gluon plasma rapidly cooled and was extinguished on the voidpeaks of the early universe, except where the globules got trapped in 6D kinks of spacetime. There they glided in the slipstream for billions of years until beings discovered them, built machines to extract and cool them, and reheat them in their stellar furnaces.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bands of aquamarine lodestone tori wrap around the hitting part of a hefty, double-fisted truncheon. On the bottom handle there's a slot for a battery to juice the magnets.

part.Name: LatchesOn
part.BehaviorDescription: Latches onto metal objects for 8-12 rounds.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Thick and diamond-hard headbone with three horn holes functions as the jumbo head of a bludgeon. A long shaft of shining steel was driven through the maw and welded inside.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A long slate rod flares out at the collar to hold capacitors and a concussive corm.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A long slate rod flares out at the collar to hold capacitors and an electrified corm for searing liturgy to memory.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ring magnets form a cylindric mace-head to bash against objects and syphon their electron juice into a battery slotted on the shaft.

part.Name: SapChargeOnHit
part.BehaviorDescription: On hit, this weapon drains electrical charge from its target and their equipment and transfers it to a slotted energy cell.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bell bronze is shaped to a point and its handle wrapped in leather.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Iron wormwags out of its halite stub of a hilt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Pits mark the blade like craters on an iron edge-world.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bright metal spills out the leather fuzz hilt along the killer's recurve.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The edge is bright and polished.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A use-dull and finger-smudged knife folds in on itself.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wet clay dresses the edge and dirt cakes the hilt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wide and bright blade has been painted with entrails.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Salt and scars form a comet's tail along the azure blade edge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Volcanic glass was fished from Fuming God Sea and chipped to shape along the Icepyres.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blue and shining metal narrows to a sticking point.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A ribbon of leather is looped through the hilt of a bright blade.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A razor edge of dense and dusky metal zigzags in shape. Its face is matte and starless.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue.

part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue. Casts mottled with dust particles were culled and fed to lithovores, leaving only the perfect hexagonal prisms.

part.Short: Quark-gluon plasma rapidly cooled and was extinguished on the voidpeaks of the early universe, except where the globules got trapped in 6D kinks of spacetime. There they glided in the slipstream for billions of years until beings discovered them, built machines to extract and cool them, and reheat them in their stellar furnaces.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A matte blade of ionic plastifer sits on a finger-rest hilt. When charged it blurs in high-width motion and jostles its material obstacles out of the way.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: When charged, this weapon's penetration value is equal to the defender's armor value.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Through a bore in the wood grip draws a crinkled beam of pale light. In motion it heats to steel-melting temperature and whirrs matter away.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Through a bore in the wood grip draws a long and tapered beam of pale light. In motion it heats to steel-melting temperature and whirrs matter away.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Through a bore in the wood grip draws a stout beam of pale light. In motion it heats to steel-melting temperature and whirrs matter away.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Damp leather wraps the wood haft up to a sharpened bit of bell bronze.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An axe edge is dressed with splinter hairs of brinestalk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wrought iron was moulded to a crescent for scything the rough hides of watervine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hairline rust ribbons the bit from hook to hook on the year-weary axe.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its polished steel glistens on a flat plane, and skin oil stains the straps of its leathery haft.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its polished steel glistens on a flat twin plane, and skin oil stains the straps of its long leathery haft.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A block of bright steel was sharpened to an edge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its polished steel glistens on a flat plane, and skin oil stains the straps of its leathery haft. The pommel is capped with a glittering opal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bright steel was moulded to a crescent for scything the rough hides of watervine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The luster of the azure edge fades to shadow at the beard of the bit, and a backspike balances the whole bladed volume.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The luster of the wide azure edge fades to shadow at the beard of the twin bits. Hairline cracks ribbon the haft.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bright azure metal edges out into an elegant half-circle bound to a steel shaft.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bright azure metal edges out into two elegant half-circles bound to a long steel shaft.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A razored wedge of dusky metal was welded to a steel haft.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wide razored wedge of dusky metal was welded to a great steel haft.

part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A thong of banded metal jitters with concussive potential. The plastifer handle is slotted on the heel knot with an battery case.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Leather was braided through a ring knot to a coiling thong. There are blood stains on the cracker tip.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Scratches checker the length of edged bell bronze, and skin oil dampens the leather grip.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Scratches checker the broad length of edged bell bronze, and skin oil dampens the double-handed leather grip.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Pits mark the length of the blade like craters on an iron edge-world.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Pits mark the broad length of the blade like craters on an iron edge-world.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The long edge is bright and polished.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The long edge is bright and polished. A wide grip is stained with dozens of oily fingerprints.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Salt and scars form a comet's tail along the length of the azure blade's edge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Salt and scars form a comet's tail along the broad length of the azure blade's edge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bright metal is polished to a ghost shine. Streaks of shaded blue show where the blade was carbon-folded on the forge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bright and wide metal is polished to a ghost shine. Streaks of shaded blue show where the large blade was carbon-folded on the forge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A razored edge of matte and starless alloy lengthens from point to welded shaft of steel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wide and razored edge of matte and starless alloy lengthens from point to welded shaft of steel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Skeletal coral was torn off its reef-home and chewed to a cutting edge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A ribbon of azzurum runs through the hilt and pilots the outer arc of phantom steel. The blade's edge blurs into the script of a dead stanza.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Quark-gluon plasma rapidly cooled and was extinguished on the voidpeaks of the early universe, except where the globules got trapped in 6D kinks of spacetime. There they glided in the slipstream for billions of years until beings discovered them, built machines to extract and cool them, and reheat them in their stellar furnaces.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Quark-gluon plasma rapidly cooled and was extinguished on the voidpeaks of the early universe, except where the globules got trapped in 6D kinks of spacetime. There they glided in the slipstream for billions of years until beings discovered them, built machines to extract and cool them, and reheat them in their stellar furnaces.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A long, matte blade of ionic plastifer sits on a finger-rest hilt. When charged it blurs in high-width motion and jostles its material obstacles out of the way.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: When charged, this weapon's penetration value is equal to the defender's armor value.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: What was once merely a carbide axe is now a florid work of art. Curling wires wind around the haft of the weapon as the creeping vine of a rose plant; modules and battery housing are mounted on the flat of its blade where the blossom might rest.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The air swims around the axe's triangular head like the heat off the high salt sun. Such a weapon of war seems a strange fit for an agrarian people like the hindren, but it serves to illustrate how cornered prey might react over long time scales.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Half battle axe and half vinereaper, the ancestral tool called Yal evokes the struggle between the hindren cultivators and the cruelty of a harsh winter. A biting cold radiates off the curved blade.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Beautiful ribbons of leaf are etched along the edges of the broad and oiled blade. The pine handle is carved with its name: Difucila.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Lifeblood the color of amaranth and dried in moonlight paints the clenched and giant fist of the dead forest Saad. The sight of it unfurls one of Time's right-blown ribbons: this is a relic in all or near-all futures, and the wielder perhaps =pronouns.possessive= fossil-mate and secret sharer.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The hilt was broken and remade, pieced together from iron, jewel, and leather across the prism-scatter of the past and forever becoming something new. The blade bears the scars of techniques forcing it into killing shape time and again.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Lead is cast to a cylindric lump shaved to a point.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Pocks sprinkle the barrel steel from a hundred salt storms. The stock is spoon carved from fibrous brinestalk in the style of the Issachari dune tribe.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Carbon steel gleams on its sawed muzzle. A dented butt stock cuts at right angle to the shoulder.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Expert rifling grooved its carbon steel barrel to helical precision. Smudges are printed on the scope glass.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A smoothbore barrel of found steel is blackened by pocks of gunpowder mess.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Telescoped cylinders pinch the mirror point, and under them grows a sylph-like stock of sea-ferried nutwood.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Three carbon steel barrels fit together into an arc-edged triangle of luminous ritualism. They pinch the mirror point inside.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Perpendicular to the neon azure barrel is a square-plated scope inset with a large ocular lens. The sight through the lens distorts as the gun tilts, but the vector drawn remains unchanged.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Gaseous coolant billows through a chiffon tube, putting dew on the wide and planar barrel chrome. It spills out onto the air from a ice-chipped muzzle.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A rifled prism refracts and refocuses light to tunnel things toward its wielder. Sophists call it a 'here ray'.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Artisanally carved wood castles a sextet of parallel conductors and a sliding photon armature. The grain is scorched black on the rifle's stock.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hue-vapored crysteel cocoons the gold/water mechanism that pinches light from wavelength to waveshort. Plasmon slag bubbles on the crest of the barrel like superheated sludge-life.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Astralgals demarcate the phasic slits along the frustum's length. Noise is sucked out of time in expectancy of cross-plane fusion.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The hind bone of a salthopper was scorched clean and bent to a recurve bow. Sinew is strung on the nocks.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Idler wheels were tinkered to the limbs, and wound cables stiffen to accentuate the archer's strength.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pig sinew bow string is notched behind a brinestalk rail narrowed for a dart to fit.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Magnets on the string nocks hum and a slender curve of metal hums back. The air crackles as fingers approach the arrow rest.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Servos click on the wheeling groves and a miniature air turbine exaggerates the pull of the bowstring.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: This weapon increases the base penetration of its ammo by 4. This weapon increases the damage die of its ammo by 4. This weapon increases the damage bonus of its ammo by 1.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A narrow shaft fletched with bird feather is capped by a wooden head.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A narrow shaft fletched with bird feather is capped by a steel head.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Reds and oranges swirl in the bulbous arrowhead. Ignition is a notch away.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A narrow shaft fletched with bird feather is capped by a carbide head.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A narrow shaft fletched with bird feather is capped by a head of folded carbide.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A narrow shaft fletched with bird feather is capped by a fullerite head.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A narrow shaft fletched with bird feather is capped by a crysteel head.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A narrow shaft fletched with bird feather is capped by a head of flawless crysteel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A narrow shaft fletched with bird feather is capped by a head of zetachrome.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A chrome chain wraps around a self-winding flywheel and is spotted with grease dew. One long barrel is nicked with steel scarring.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The tick of a firing pin against steel makes the fauna start. A chrome sight eases the arc of the parabola.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Grease wets the arming handle and streaks down the wide missile chute toward a welded shoulder rest.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A bright gashead tips the end of the steely death chute.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A limpid fuel pump exposes ribbons of oil slick, and behind it a voltage gauge ticks. The slanted heat shield is scorched black.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hand pump slides into a chrome canister with illustrations of wilting plants etched in relief.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hand pump slides into a chrome canister with illustrations of rotting fungi etched in relief.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Caked gundust is painted on the inner lune of the mortar.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's a hermetic cask, hose, and nozzle. Inscribed are the words: 'in case of dimensional emergency, spray'.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cables purled together form the barrel of a blastgun that fires along the cambered electromagnetic field lines.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Baroque and kite-like volumes of metal are arranged on an axis as a lathe to shave dimensionality off their inner spaces. A giant stock and grip of painted fullerite support their tremendous weight.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Sleek spiral barrels of matrixed metal cradle an enormous cyclinder of ionic gas. On fire the mixture is hyperpressurized into shot and sent to explode at sight's end.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A chrome and quartz-dusted honeycomb mounts the viewing plane and threatens obliteration to all. Bar weldings bend to its gigantic weight, and rocketheads peak out of hexagonal hive.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A smudged and salted chrome wheel clicks to moon time. Just above a brinestalk hand panel, the grip medallion shines in delphian lineage.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Black acrylic grips are run through with hairline cracks from where nervous and sweat-damp hands squeezed the precision out of their shot.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A tension spring shoves a firing pin to bang a barrel of gas and eject a cabled grapnel; then a winch winds it back.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A tin-slender clip hangs off the scratched chrome magazine well.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The pistol is engraved with watervine hemp and encircled in saltstone. On the grip is an image of a nomad and knight in saltstone. The knight is striking down the nomad.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Perpendicular to the neon azure barrel is a square-plated scope inset with a large ocular lens. The sight through the lens distorts as the gun tilts, but the vector drawn remains unchanged.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A spiral crank closes a chrome-encased circuit and ejects charge through two contact tips. Smoke twirls through their yellow glow.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Starless metal on the barrel imbibes light and routes it to the null place. The grip acrylic is patterned after ley lines.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Artisanally carved wood castles a sextet of parallel conductors and a sliding photon armature. The grain is scorched black on the pistol's stock.

objects.object: //need this one to fire both the freeze ray and heat ray sounds.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blood sieved of chunky pieces sloshes around a cannister of tetraxenonoglass. Vacuum pressure sucks air in through the barrel, and slits on the slide stop vent a metronomic belch.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hue-vapored crysteel cocoons the gold/water mechanism that pinches light from wavelength to waveshort. Plasmon slag bubbles on the crest of the barrel like superheated sludge-life.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Behind the muzzle, a glass-bound nimbus of unstable spacetime curls around an astral tether. The trigger mechanism cuts the tether and out-vacuums the anomaly to the free world.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A spiral crank closes a chrome-encased circuit and ejects immense amounts of charge through two contact tips. Smoke twirls through their white-hot glow.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Raw flesh is stretched on a lump that approximates the shape of a handgun. Pressure smushes a throbbing vein against the underskin and blood-pulp is coughed out of two ribbed metal tubes on a metronome tick. At moments out of sequence, an unseen energy is piped along the psychic leys and into the organ-mess, producing a runny bother.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A tension spring shoves a firing pin to bang a barrel of gas and eject a long-cabled grapnel at precise range; and then a winch winds it back.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A handful of pellets are encased in a thick wax-paper and plastic shell.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A nutwood forestock hangs underneath the chrome rib and, when pumped, erupts into ecstatic clicking.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Nutwood stock parts were unscrewed in favor of starless metal. A greased pump slides shot to the chamber with minimal friction.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The craftsmanship of this pistol worked in brass and chrome is breathtaking: grips of kingswood call the palm to an airless wrap, the hammer is contoured to the thumb by the microinch, and the sight draws the eye down the barrel like the slipping of silk. It's engraved all around with withered ivy, and the muzzle is kissed in blood.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: +1 Ego Critical hits scored with this weapon get an extra +4 bonus to penetration rolls. When this weapons fires a shot with its last round of ammo, the shot has perfect aim and is guaranteed to score a critical hit.

part.Name: TakenAccomplishment
part.Text: You recovered the masterwork pistol and legendary ode to vengeance, the =this=.
part.Hagiograph: The gunslinger-sultan =name= slew each of the seven lords of House Isner with a masterwork revolver and supped over their piled corpses.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ions were spun into a euhedral disc on a spinning wheel, and aquamarine was heat-set on the inner ring by deepsea steam.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A salt-scratched blade head is fit to a splintered handle with a wood wedge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Flax was mowed from the Bowl of Iris, stripped into fibers, and weaved into a soft grid by the fisherfolk of the Pale Sea.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A piece of rock was water-cleaved from its birthing bed and tumbled by time into a sphere.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A piece of rock was water-cleaved from its birthing bed and tumbled by time into a large sphere.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's a piece of rock, older than every book.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's a sizeable piece of rock, older than every symbol.

part.Short: It's a large piece of rock, older than every idea.

part.Short: A metal shoal of waffled hexagons is clamped by a chrome lever. It sparkles in soft light.
