part.Hagiograph: Woe to the vanquished! =name= feasted on =this.an= by the light of the Beetle Moon.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A chunk of metallic debris.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The forces of slaughter have rearranged parts of the body. You ponder how rearrangement means something different in each of its contexts: pieces on a game board, favored courtiers in a king's hall, and parts on a body.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Fire has poached the light from this body. Its stillness writhes against the changing soil.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The forces of slaughter have rearranged parts of the body. You ponder how rearrangement means something different in each of its contexts: pieces on a game board, favored courtiers in a king's hall, and parts on a body.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Who's preserved the skins and innards of this still one? Was it the dry air of Moghra'yi? Or the doting persistence of human ritual? Does it matter?

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The blood is still wet. Never had you regarded wetness as a sort of clock, until now.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Here lies a humanoid who'd have never guessed their torso would shelter dust from the gills of tiny mushrooms, but should have.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tissue was mineralized while it grew and then snapped off the tree of living things to become an artifact of life. It was then stewed in burnt peat and turned to a hard goo.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: Far too gooey for your taste.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Matter was crushed, burned, and granulated into a soft powder.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tissue was mineralized while it grew and then snapped off the tree of living things to become an artifact of life.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Poking out of a pool of coral resin are the unbleached bones of a human adult. Its remains have seeded a grove of otherworldly shrooms.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Poking out of a copse of brinestalk are the unbleached bones of a human adult.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: These appear to be the flattened remains of some vainglorious humanoid.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A minuscule graphene array that processes optical data against a repository of organic lifeforms.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You gain access to the precise hit point, armor, and dodge values of biological creatures.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A minuscule graphene array that processes optical data against a repository of robotic lifeforms and artifacts.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You gain access to the precise hit point, armor, and dodge values of robotic creatures and you automatically identify artifacts.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The emitted frequencies of your tiniest bits are synchronized with the standardized band for force emission.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You can walk through forcefields.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Carnal instructions dictate the reformation of the face's bone structure and plump tissue mass into a soft and angelic countenance. Through such thaumaturgy, the people of hoary Ibul, cradled in the breast of a collapsed ice shelf, wander its lamplighted streets in rosy-cheeked disinterest.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: +1 Ego

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Small distortions in the electromagnetic field caused by machine folk are visible to this sensor.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You detect nearby robots without having to see them.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Geosocial location data is painted across the glass lune and is underlaid with representations of the living loam that has shifted over earth to take its place.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: Your chance of becoming lost in ruins is reduced by 30%. Your chance of becoming lost in other terrain is reduced by 10%. These effects do not stack with the bonuses of a compass bracelet.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Planate chutes conduct the myoelectric force and push the body through water.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: +200 move speed while swimming

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A fractal lattice of dermal applique conducts the inner glow to the outer world.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: +8% chance to refract light-based attacks

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Encoded on this chip are the neural patterns of a particular skill.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You gain a skill whose cost is between 0 and 50 SP.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Pillowy fiberglass scales tense around a supporting axis. Once installed, they'll unwind and inflate under the skin.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: +6 heat resistance +6 cold resistance +6 electrical resistance +6 acid resistance

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Nerve-packed retina scatters incoming radiation and bends light so the irises turn jade.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You gain the ability to see in the dark.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Banded ropes of hydrogel are bundled into one.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: +6 movespeed

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Nerve bundles so arranged to stimulate muscles in the arm along a parabolic slide rule.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: Your throw range is increased by 2. When you throw something at a target inside your throw range, your throwing accuracy is 100%.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The diaphanous dermis throws the circulatory, muscular, and nervous networks into silhouetted relief.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: +2 DV

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Chrome clasps fasten arm joints to emulate the stillness of unlife.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: For the purpose of determining your accuracy with ranged attacks, your agility is treated as if it were 6 points higher.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Neuronically charged tissue sheaths transmit the will faster than what cell biology had achieved.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You fire pistols 25% faster.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blue carbide merely dents where weak collagen would be smashed to bits.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: Your fists deal 2d3 damage.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Skeletal hand of cobalt blue metal remains suspended in temporary lifelessness.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The quartet of knee joint extensors gain the assistance of a synthetic fifth.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: Your Charge range is increased by 4 spaces.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Between the multipronged sticktool and cipherbox, one can interface with all available robotic ports.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You rebuke robots as if you were 5 levels higher.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Nanoscopic stents inflate the gossamer brain-threads that restrict the conduction of the will.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: Activated. Cooldown 100. You gain +40 quickness for 10 rounds, then you become sluggish for 10 rounds (-10 quickness).

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The metabolic rhythms of the Holy City's denizens are synchronized to their diurnal rituals: during the day, repose in prayer beneath the shade of a fluted ziggurat; during the night, prowl the toxic arboreta for sacrifices.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: +10% to natural healing rate during the day. Once per night, you can Prowl, gaining +6 agility and +10 movespeed for 100 rounds.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Near the Fuming God Sea, where seawater crashes into sunrock and erupts into mephitic vapor, a labyrinth of volcanic grottos form a dimensionless space where the utility of sight wanes. For the children of the deep, new senses wax in its stead.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: Staircases and other up/down map transitions are always revealed to you.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Compressed gas drives piston rods into musculature powdered with graphite dust and sends the jumper soaring.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: Your Jump range is increased by 4 spaces.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Carbide plates are molded to skull shape and alloyed with foam that inflates on impact.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You cannot be dazed or stunned by kinetic effects.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Inverted tops balance the microstructure of a control unit housed in a bionic disk. Inside, the phases of reality are overlayed and projected outward.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You can interact with both in-phase and out-of-phase objects and creatures.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Heat-activated gel is stored in a bionic capsule and dispensed through subcutaneous rubber hoses.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: Automatically discharges flame-retardant gel every turn you're on fire.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Spikes tipped with crysteel are sutured to the skeleton and shoot through the skin and ground when tensed.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You cannot be forced to move by physical means.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A fractal lattice of dermal applique conducts the inner glow to the outer world.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: +16% chance to refract light-based attacks

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Encoded on this chip are the neural patterns of a particular skill.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You gain a skill whose cost is between 51 and 150 SP.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Encoded on this chip are the schematics for a whole class of low-tier artifacts.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You gain access to every schematic for a single class of artifacts.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Carbon fiber shoots out of two electrodermal contact pads.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: +50 electric resistance

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Interlinked plates of wafery carbide tessellate into a subcutaneous sheet.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: +1 AV

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The new flesh is as ghost film, cloaking none of the machinery of life.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: +3 DV

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A whole new pair of hands fabricated from graphene and neutrafoam. Their pylons await engagement.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: +2 Agility

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A whole new arm fabricated from graphene and neutrafoam. Its pylon awaits engagement.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: +2 Strength

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Neutrafoam ropes are banded and bundled into a fluted column.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: +10 movespeed

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Instructions dictate the reformation of the face into a countenance that arouses latent desires in its onlookers.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: +2 Ego

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The microscopic cartridge synthesizes dopamine at a rapid rate and floods the neural pathways in motivational bliss.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: +2 Willpower

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An apparatus-in-chromium that pumps blood in smooth waves rather than the frantic beating of carcass-grown muscle tissue.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: +2 Toughness

part.Name: Description
part.Short: For ages they dreamed, 'the hands must grow'. In the soft luster of a laboratory, the dream was realized.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You can wield two-handed weapons in one hand.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Stents and pneumatic applicators are hardwired to an intelligent control unit that dictates the injection of protean dyes into the veins.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: Reduces the action cost of applying injectors by 80%. Can be loaded with up to 8 injectors, which the medassist module AI will automatically apply when appropriate (at its own discretion) for no action cost.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ionic dust dissolved from palladium facilitates the transfer of computing current.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: Provides 20 units of compute power on the local lattice. +2 Intelligence if implanted in a head.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Fluted keys for every wavelength along every spectrum permit entrance through every portal.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You can unlock any door.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Three catheters imprint the skin from underneath.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: The effects of tonics last twice as long.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Pillowy neutrofoam scales tense around a supporting axis. Once installed, they'll unwind and inflate under the skin.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: +9 heat resistance +9 cold resistance +9 electrical resistance +9 acid resistance

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The flux inside this milliscopic cask can fold space on just a large enough scale to shunt a human chassis nearby.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: Activated. Cooldown 100. You teleport to a random, explored space on the map.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Meticulously detailed modeling software and instructions for facial reformation allow the host to assume the visage of choice, forever obsoleting masks.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: +300 reputation with a faction you choose at installation time

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Carbide mounting rods scaffold a gyroscopic shelf designed for extra baggage.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You gain an additional Back equipment slot.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Digestive bile and alkaline churn in glass chambers, while synthetic tissue sieves out bio-toxins.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You are immune to poison and disease.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Paracausal circuitry excites the structure of spacetime into a normotropic particulate.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You emit clouds of normality gas every turn.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Encoded on this chip are the neural patterns of a particular skill.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You gain a skill whose cost is greater than 151 SP.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Encoded on this chip are the schematics for a whole class of mid-tier artifacts.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You gain access to every schematic for a single class of artifacts.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Black fullerite merely dents where weak collagen would be smashed to bits.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: Your fists deal 2d4+1 damage.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Skeletal hand of jet black metal remains suspended in temporary lifelessness.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Triangular treads swathe the teeth of giant gears that turn to locomote. Their human has escaped the confines of bipedal motion.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: +150 movespeed +4 to saves vs. forced movement, knockdown, and being restrained You cannot wear shoes. This implant can't be uninstalled.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A contoured, plasteel body-plate absorbs impact shock and disintegrates into the bloodstream.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: Neutralizes one damage source that would cause a lethal amount of damage or deal at least 50% of your max HP. This implant is destroyed in the process.

part.Name: LifeSaver
part.LethalMessage: =subject.Name's= =object.name= =object.verb:burst= outward, destroying =objpronouns.reflexive= to prevent potentially lethal damage.
part.MaxHitpointsThresholdMessage: =subject.Name's= =object.name= =object.verb:burst= outward, destroying =objpronouns.reflexive= to prevent catastrophic damage.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The back-mounted gun rack of polished chrome has two slots for pistols to sit over each shoulder or for a single rifle to sit over the shoulder of choice.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You gain an additional left and right missile weapon slot. You cannot wear equipment on your back.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A geospatial core is fitted with a bionic tether.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You can imprint this implant with a location (cooldown 100) and recoil back to it (cooldown 50).

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Laminated metal is bound as concentric spheres, softening magnetic eddies and powering near-field orbits.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You gain an additional Floating Nearby equipment slot.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small lune of tetraxenonoglass is curved at Q radius to account for interdimensional parallax.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: When you fire a missile weapon or throw something, your projectile shifts phase to pass through obstacles and reach your target.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Encoded on this chip are the schematics for a whole class of high-tier artifacts.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You gain access to every schematic for a single class of artifacts.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A magnetically-shielded headstock holds space in kinetic suspension while a force spindle spins and sharpens it to a point.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You fabricate force knives in unoccupied hand or thrown weapon slots. If you throw a force knife, another one immediately materializes in your thrown weapon slot. Force knives deal 1d8 damage, have penetration value equal to their target's armor value, and have +6 throwing range. Force knives disappear after losing contact with you or becoming unequipped. If you have a force modulator implant installed, force knives can be thrown through forcefields.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A length of raw space was kineticized and sharpened to a point.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A plastifer arm forks from the scapula and copies instructions issued from nerve to muscle in its grown twin.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You gain an extra thrown weapon slot. When you perform a throw, you throw from all your thrown weapon slots at once.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A dozen armatures and manipulators splay out from a metal brace that fuses to the metacarpals.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You can tinker and repair in combat at the action cost of one turn. Reduces the action cost of other tinker skills by 40%. Grants a bonus to identifying artifacts as if your Intelligence score were increased by 8. +10% chance to recover bits from disassembling artifacts.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Picophase transceiver arrays assemble an exquisitely detailed model of one's surroundings.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You gain total visibility in a radius of 10 spaces around you, blocked only by force fields and spacetime anomalies.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A microturbine skims hemopower off the circulation of blood and the chemical reactions therein.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: Provides a continuous 5000 units of charge per turn to equipped items that can access onboard power systems, such as items with the Jacked mod.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Crystals involute along angles of stillness.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: Activated. Cooldown 100. Creates up to 6 contiguous squares of stasis field that last for about 5 rounds.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Emulsion slicks on the cheek and laser light evokes pareidolic warmth.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: +200 reputation with a faction you choose when you install this implant You can activate this implant to change the chosen faction.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A minuscule graphene array that processes optical data against the final ontological and phenomenological ledger.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You gain access to the precise hit point, armor, and dodge values of robotic creatures, biological creatures, and structures. You automatically identify artifacts. Staircases and other up/down map transitions are always revealed to you.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Around a central processor, neural grafts attach to the brain lobes responsible for the feeling of social warmth.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: Whenever you perform the water ritual with a new creature, you gain an extra 25 reputation. If you install this implant after you treat with a creature for the first time, you gain 25 reputation the next time you treat with them. Reputation costs in the water ritual are reduced by 20%. You may Proselytize one additional creature. Compute power on the local lattice increases this implant's effectiveness.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Shaved crystal faces are matrixed and angled to pipe stillness across a graph of live vertices.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: Activated. Cooldown 200. You choose one creature in line of sight. All other creatures are put into stasis fields for 15 rounds.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dappled crysteel merely dents where weak collagen would be smashed to bits.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: Your fists deal 3d4 damage.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Skeletal hand of dappled emerald metal remains suspended in temporary lifelessness.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The flux inside this milliscopic cask can fold space on just a large enough scale to shunt a human chassis nearby. Nonlinear circuitry calculates all possible outcomes and discards those that land the host outside the target area.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: Activated. Cooldown 50. You teleport to any explored space on the map.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Encoded on this chip are the neural patterns of a particular skill tree.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You gain access to a whole skill tree.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Reticulated around the quatrefoil of an elephantine splat are the filed glyphs of sightlessness, messages from the fellowed mysterion across the Gulf. Wings and banisters are ordered in the perfect dimensions of some type of strange hierarchy.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription:
+100 move speed +50 hitpoints +100 carry capacity +3 Ego You gain the ability to fly.
Activated. Cooldown 100. You invoke a concussive force in the surrounding area, throwing enemies back and stunning them.
You cannot wear equipment on your back. This implant can't be uninstalled.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wavecrests of slag interrupt the plane geometry of the gigantic seat, scars of index to the moment when the mystai rolled the ruby boulder it was carved from out of the hoggish earth. The splats and claw feet are burned and disarranged; the ritual of transformation never ends.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription:
+100 move speed +50 hitpoints +100 carry capacity +3 Ego You gain the ability to fly.
Activated. Cooldown 100. You generate a pyrokinesis field around your person.
You cannot wear equipment on your back. This implant can't be uninstalled.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Chiliads of glitz are stuck to the naked folk carved in relief of the aureate seat. They people that gilded hill, their bodies conjugate to each other in every way geometry allows, spilling out from the crest and down the scroll arms that once upheld the quivering limbs of a high priest to lust.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription:
+100 move speed +50 hitpoints +100 carry capacity +3 Ego You gain the ability to fly.
Activated. Cooldown 100. You release a burst of glitter dust around yourself.
You cannot wear equipment on your back. This implant can't be uninstalled.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Across the whole of its wide splat and planar armrests, hairlines partition the chair and its vibrant stones into clusters of galaxies. Their fractal patterns at microscale put them beyond the skillwork of now-fossilized carpenters; they must be the scars of leylines.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription:
+100 move speed +50 hitpoints +100 carry capacity +3 Ego You gain the ability to fly.
Activated. Cooldown 100. You sunder spacetime, teleporting to a random location in Qud.
You cannot wear equipment on your back. This implant can't be uninstalled.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A tiny wedge of plastic.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Crisp pages of goatskin vellum are bound into a codex.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Sheets of flayed and stretched goatskin are bound together with sap and scrawled on with kid blood.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A sheet of loose leaf is divided by coordinate lines in cyan. It seems to have been torn from a binder.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Paper made of brinestalk pulp is covered in a shaky ink scrawl. It looks like it's been crumpled and uncrumpled many times.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Several sheets of tattered, age-stained parchment are bound together at the margins by some sort of glue.

part.Name: Render
part.DisplayName: {{W|scroll bound by a strand of kelp}}

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Several sheets of tattered, age-stained parchment are bound together by a strand of kelp from a distant reef.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A voluminous tome whose pages are bound between two slabs of waxed wood.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A voluminous tome whose pages are bound between two slabs of waxed wood.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A voluminous tome whose pages are bound between two slabs of waxed wood.

part.Name: Render
part.DisplayName: {{W|Across Moghra'yi, Vol. III: Oth, the Free City}}

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A voluminous tome whose pages are bound between two slabs of waxed wood.

part.Name: Render
part.DisplayName: {{W|On the Origins and Nature of the Dark Calculus}}

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Fine pages of lined parchment are bound into a algebraic codex.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A machine of spiraling gear trains and canals of copper has been meticulously tooled onto the coverboard of the Mechanimist torah.

part.Name: Render
part.DisplayName: {{W|On Humanoid Mimicry of Animals and Plants}}

part.Name: Render
part.DisplayName: {{W|Disquisition on the Malady of the Mimic}}

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The coverboard of this ancient and hefty tome is faded to the average hue of ten thousand families of dust and skin oils.

part.Name: Render
part.DisplayName: {{W|Blood and Fear: On the Life Cycle of Lah}}

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This large-print volume is made of hand-pulped and pressed brinestalk paper. Its cover is preserved with resin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This large-print volume is made of hand-pulped and pressed brinestalk paper. Its cover preserved with resin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This large-print volume is made of hand-pulped and pressed brinestalk paper. Its cover preserved with resin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A loose ledger of vellum has been rolled, bound to umbilici, and sealed with the wax mark of the Mechanimists.

part.Name: Render
part.DisplayName: {{W|Modulo Moon Stair and the Tree of Life}}

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Fine pages of lined parchment are bound into a algebraic codex.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A loose ledger of vellum has been rolled, bound to umbilici, and sealed with the wax mark of the master maker.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A loose ledger of brinestalk pulp has been bound to sticks of waxed wood and furled.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A loose ledger of brinestalk pulp has been bound to sticks of waxed wood and furled.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Beneath the metal shutter, a crystalline disk is grooved with microscopic pits that encode data.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Inside the small cask, liquid salt transfers ions to the cathode and produces spark.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Spinning the stannic cuboid about any of its axes of rotation generates a pinch of resistance. A wrist strap and gyroscopic frame enable the cell to absorb and store its wearer's kinetic energy.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The photovoltaic cube bakes with the warm of the High Salt Sun and stores it as quickened juice.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Million-year-old earth rock decays inside the battery box, where the pinged out gamma particles are routed through a junction diode and stored for explosive power use.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An ursteel casket pens in the magnetic field that holds positrons in suspension. When a current is formed, the paired particles annihilate and send the full force of universal rupture through a channel and to a device.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Inside the insulated cask of the battery, the electromotive apparatus cracks the energy out of acid and converts it to electrical charge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Inside the insulated cask of the battery, the electromotive apparatus cracks the energy out of oil and converts it to electrical charge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Inside the insulated cask of the battery, the electromotive apparatus cracks the energy out of lava and converts it to electrical charge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Inside the insulated cask of the battery, the electromotive apparatus cracks the energy out of blood and converts it to electrical charge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A length of brinestalk is wrapped in oil-sodden cloth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A phosphorescent opal-like fits in the palm of a hand and glows with the light of auroras absorbed chiliads ago.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's worm silk gauze spooled about a wood rod and suited to staunch bleeding.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A glass tube and hype needle deliver a tonic directly to the bloodstream. This one is empty.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: 一股温暖的刺痛感袭遍全身。

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Lichen sticks in the winding grooves of woodshed, shimmering and smelling of spice.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Heals and confuses when eaten.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A piece of scrap was shed or peeled off a machine fossil.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: 玻璃管和炒作针将补品直接输送到血液中。

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: You feel unusually amorous for about half a day, during which time you'll fall in love with the first thing you look at. If you inject someone else, they'll fall in love with you and follow you around for 3000-3600 rounds. There's a 1% failure rate for every level higher they are than you.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Duration: 41-50 rounds +6 Strength +2 temporary hit points per level -25 move speed You cannot feel pain. You are immune to fear. You suffer 1% of your maximum hit points in damage each round (this damage cannot reduce you to below one hit point)
part.GenotypeAlt: Duration: 41-50 rounds +9 Strength +3 temporary hit points per level -25 move speed You cannot feel pain. You are immune to fear. You suffer 1% of your maximum hit points in damage each round (this damage cannot reduce you to below one hit point)

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Duration: 1001-1200 rounds Your movement speed is increased by 25% at night and underground but reduced by 20% in the daylight. +3 Agility at night and underground -3 Agility in the daylight You can see in the dark (radius 8). You grow burrowing claws. You suffer double damage from light-based attacks.
part.GenotypeAlt: Duration: 1001-1200 rounds Your movement speed is increased by 40% at night and underground but reduced by 20% in the daylight. +4 Agility at night and underground -3 Agility in the daylight You can see in the dark (radius 8). You suffer double damage from light-based attacks.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Duration: 18-22 rounds You are immune to confusing attacks. Your activated mental mutations cool down twice as quickly.
part.GenotypeAlt: Duration: 18-22 rounds You are immune to confusing attacks. You peer into your near future (you may revert to the point in time at which you first used this drug at the end of its duration).

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Duration: 41-50 rounds +8 DV There is a 25% chance per round that you phase out of the spatial dimension for 1-3 rounds.
part.GenotypeAlt: Duration: 41-50 rounds +8 DV You gain the ability to phase out of the spatial dimension for 7-9 rounds.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Duration: 10 rounds You recover 0.6 hit points per level (minimum 3) each round. At the end of the tenth round, you are purged of all short-term, biological debuffs and you regrow up to one severed appendage.
part.GenotypeAlt: Duration: 10 rounds You recover 0.9 hit points per level (minimum 5) each round. At the end of the tenth round, you are purged of all short-term, biological debuffs and you regrow up to one severed appendage.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Duration: 41-50 rounds +100 electric resistance +25 cold resistance -1 AV +5 to saves vs. being restrained. -5 to saves vs. bleeding. You only suffer half damage from bludgeoning attacks. You only suffer half damage from falling. You cannot be grabbed.
part.GenotypeAlt: Duration: 41-50 rounds +100 electric resistance +50 cold resistance -1 AV +5 to saves vs. being restrained. -5 to saves vs. bleeding. You only suffer 25% damage from bludgeoning attacks. You only suffer 25% damage from falling. You cannot be grabbed. These effects stack if multiple rubbergums are ingested.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: You gain either a permanent +1 bonus to a random attribute or one mutation point.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An array of tinkering utensils clang against tin: tweezers, a tiny hammer, pliers, inverted pliers, glass marbles, and three wrenches.

part.Name: Toolbox
part.BehaviorDescription: This item increases the chance of recovering additional bits when you disassemble an artifact.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An array of tinkering utensils clang against carbide: voltmeter, polyjack, soldering knife, ion shield, circuitboard, and three spare vacuum tubes.

part.Name: Toolbox
part.BehaviorDescription: When powered, this item greatly increases the chance of identifying artifacts and recovering additional bits when you disassemble artifacts. When unpowered, it functions as a basic toolkit, mildly increasing the chance of recovering additional bits.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its head is a shard of grinded metal, pointed on one end and flat on the other. Dust is stuck in its hairline nicks and shines across the opalescent spectrum of rock possibility.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pneumatic tube is driven under a ratchet and through a giant drill head. Crenulated air pockets allow for vibrative absorption to create a cascade of pressure, while stabilizing backstraps protect the wielder's contact points from unsafe joggling.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A toboggan repels above the ground and gently rocks on an ethereal wave. It's encircled by a corona of wafting dust.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tiny glyphs are inscribed on each exterior face of the handheld box. Though contrarians still puzzle over their meaning, most of Qud's prominent linguist cults have converged on a single interpretation: 'For When Both Nature and Architects Have Failed You'. One brass pull ring separates you from the promise of those words.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A slotted back satchel heavy with core metal weighs the shoulders down. Stenciled on the side is a pictograph of a drill pointing down into the earth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ink is jetted into and under the skin canvas by a needle and rotary motor.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An wood-carved jewel box opens to a photographic plate and light beamer. Slit in the crystal around the edge is a verse chosen from the rhombic torah.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Spurred on by their aspiration for a fully autonomous, climate-controlled banana grove, Research and Development at Hegemonic Fruit devised the neuro animator, which knits a nervous system into the inorganic material of inanimate objects. Originally, full sentience was their product diffentiator, but within months cheaper alternates like Spray-a-Brain came to dominate the market.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A transmitter discoid beeps out staccato noise to create interference across short-range frequency bands.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A cassette is cut with hexagonal grooves and steeped in the right amount of magnetic charge to spool a spacetime tether (and generate its characteristic hot gum smell). On top, a recessed button snaps the potential and initiates the recoil.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Some tinker concocted a siphon tube and pressurized nozzle to spray liquid they didn't want to pour.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An aerosol can blown full of foaminating caulk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A chalky white cap of rice lattice sucks the salt from liquid volumes. The letter 'H' is etched on its face.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Pink slime kneads the inner wall of a glass bottle and starts to take the shape of what's on the other side.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: "SPRAY-A-BRAIN: If these walls could talk..."

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Iron fragments mottle its cankered surfaces.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A weighty and tapered block was molded from the two-tone soup of liquid copper and tin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: To ritualize the passage to Brightsheol or another thin place, several ornaments were interred: coin, manikin, locket, and pipe.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A clump of brassy metal was tumbled free of its host rock.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A clump of metal shines in the starbright hue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A clump of metal shines in the jeweler's hue of bright sunslag.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The shadows of tiny nebulae are crushed into the contours of a small stone.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A thousand sunrays are refracted through the prism of a small stone.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The black bellows of the earth are etched into red polish.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It spent millions of years tucked into the folds of earthly sediment. Then it was cracked from its cocoon, a brilliant butterfly.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Oceans reflecting the skies of a thousand fractal worlds are tucked into a geometric volume.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Impurities in the stone mother verdant things, the pattern of life repeated on a smaller scale.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It hurled through the void impacted in a black rock and slammed, shining and free, on our world.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The shadows of tiny nebulae are crushed into the contours of a small stone. All its rough edges have been polished to shine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A thousand sunrays are refracted through the prism of a small stone. All its rough edges have been polished to shine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The black bellows of the earth are etched into a red egg. All its rough edges have been polished to shine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It spent millions of years tucked into the folds of earthly sediment. Then it was cracked from its cocoon, a brilliant butterfly. All its rough edges have been polished to shine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Oceans reflecting the skies of a thousand fractal worlds are tucked into a geometric volume. All its rough edges have been polished to shine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Impurities in the stone mother verdant things, the pattern of life repeated on a smaller scale. It's rough edges have been polished to shine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It hurled through the void impacted in a black rock and slammed, shining and free, on our world. All its rough edges have been polished to shine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This figurine worked from *material* intricately depicts *creature.an*:

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wax from the hives of Odrum is mixed in dye and moulded to the shape of styli. Together in the box they sample the iridescence of the world and offer the tools to expand it.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Carved and stained olive wood houses the steel teeth that grind irregularities from cooking salt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hot metal clamp compels burning hair to the wheeling curves of the gyre.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A toral pane of crystal bisects the straight edge and puts a greasy bubble in center view.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tubes of known purpose splay at welded joints and support a plank for sitting.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Fronds are splayed out in a waxy imitation of life. It looks hard and greasy up close, but as you back away its edges burn into softness and it performs the tree function.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A sphere of some black pyritic metal succumbs to the negative pressures of gravity and tries to fall upward.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A cube with a mere four corners. Facet pictographs for sun-up, mid-day, sun-down, and mid-night insist on a new division of days. It's carved with fanciful depictions of broken clocks.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A goat's bladder is knotted at the bottom and suspended by a strap of intestine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A goat's bladder is knotted at the bottom and suspended by a strap of intestine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A large camel bladder is knotted at the bottom and suspended with a strap of intestine.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: When worn, liquid in this item doesn't count toward your encumbrance.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A jug of aluminum has been sheathed in an olive green cloth for waterkeeping.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A short channel of glass for keeping precious liquids glints when turned.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A phial of metaglass.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A phial of metaglass.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A phial of glass.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A phial of glass.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A phial of glass.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Chrome was molded into a canister and fastened with a brass mounting bracket.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Collagen was molded into a liquid vessel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A quivering bleb of static lengthens its dimensions excitably like an anxious life-thing.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Magnetic glass spike-warps the placid ferrofluids contained within.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: When powered, this container can have neutron flux safely poured into it from any source, and neutron flux may be safely poured from this container into other suitable containers.

part.Name: Render
part.DisplayName: Schrodinger page from the {{K|Annals of Qud}}

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Nary a scholar knows who composes the Annals of Qud or when the chronicling began. But the Quantivists devised a way to entangle their own pages with the offical ledger, allowing them to insert themselves into the histories in a favorable light. A few such pages remain.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rime-dotted nodules crust over the infected skin, where an algid mist clings. The fungus colony has terraformed the epidermis into what looks like a miniature range of ice-capped peaks.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tiny spore-motes flutter down from the fleshy gills that twitch on the striated skin. Trapped inside are another thousand spores waiting to be jostled free.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dozens of tiny mouths tessellate the infected skin, their moist lips pursing in asynchronicity and panting out prattle. Every so often, the cacophony harmonizes into sensible speech.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wax-weeping fungus has encased the appendage in a lucent cast. Body heat melts the innermost layer, and a thick, waxy milk sloshes against its hardened prison.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tapered lobes of cross-dimensional fungus flesh tap a center growth to the sequence of the prime numbers. Inside, sporelife readies for puffing.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A coded rectangle of paper metal can be slid through lock mechanisms to open some types of doors.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A warded stave of burnished bronze waits to unturn the right lock.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A warded stave of bright silver waits to unturn the right lock.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A warded stave of burning gold copper waits to unturn the right lock.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A warded stave of polished chrome waits to unturn the right lock.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A coded rectangle of paper metal can be slid through lock mechanisms to open some types of doors.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Toothed imperfections in the crystal are the biting cuts of a secret key.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The torsion of an external crank drags a rosin-slathered wheel against a metal cable, whose protestations emerge from the wooden case in a low, melodic groan.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The ancient bronze coin has a square cut from its center. Time has furnished it with a seafoam patina.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A silver shekel was stamped with the vine-swathed scales of the bazaar.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An old and platinum shekel has been incised with an image of the Very Old Bird.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A paper steel disc has been stamped with the profile of Barathrum the Old.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A cord extruded from metal ore conducts current when laid together.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Pieces of the old and aching world have been shaved off their timepoint and crushed to the vicinity of the present. A few bits of recognition remain: lens of glass, serif of ink, acid-ate lug, and ribbon of wire.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's a volume of waxstuff, secreted by plants and cooled into a block.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hued and life-wet beauty was gathered in twine to make a point. Now dead stems and petals desperately grasp each other.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: They're petal-shaded arks of nectarous secrets.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A candle quartz blossom spreads light across the color spectrum and concentrates it in pails of petals.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Beneath the metal shutter, a crystalline disk is grooved with microscopic pits that encode data.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Here lies the metallic husk of a defunct waydroid. It's been stripped of its valuables: copper wire, LED lights, and chrome bearings. It beeps and whirs no longer.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Here lies a waydroid in unknowing slumber. Might a willing tinker give it life again?

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This patch of furry skin is painted with dried blood.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: There's dried blood in the salted furrows of this patch of watervine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: These shards of splintered wood once formed the haft of a weapon, which must have been broken in combat.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This waterskin is filled to the brim and sealed with wax, as if from a merchant's stores.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Copper was crushed into a nugget and picked from its natural deposit. It's bisected by a scratch.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Only a great saltback could leave a print the size of a hot spring.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This rot-black lump of stringy flesh could have been someone's diseased tongue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The chaff of the yuckwheat stem tastes even worse than the stem itself, and it has no medicinal value, so it's no wonder someone threw it away.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Upset guts were turned outward and exposed to rot in the stale air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Leather scraps were cut from a wider swath for some unknown leatherworking project.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The leather bracer frays where it was ripped open.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This crude hammer is the kind used to strike rivet sets and punches when leatherworking.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Gooey analeptic residue still coats the glass tube.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dried blood paints the tip and shaft of the wooden arrow, but its colorful fletching remains pristine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tally marks on the bottom of the chest's lid account for its contents: dried lah petals, vinewafers, and waterskins.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This leather bracer is striated with streaks of dried body-salt, the marks of heavy use.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Gouge, spoon, punch, chisel, blade, and shear. These tools were made by a masterful crafter for the art of leatherworking.
